text.lg: * A fictitious name given by the poet to one of the gentlemen whom he expected would be his friend at court .
RANN na CULAIDH* ; le Rob Donn .
* Culaidh — a boat , alluding to a kept Miss .

Sealgaiir . ’ N cuimhne leat gach sealbhag ,
A Dh ’ ith thu anns an arbhar ,
Theid cuilein ann ad shealbhan ,
’ S do mharbhadh air an spot .
’ N cuimhne leat , & .
